In response to incidents such as these, Scientology have called Anonymous "cyber-terrorists." A DDoS attack occurs when multiple computers are used to attack a certain website with so much traffic that it is not accessible. The hackers attack the servers taking up all the available space, preventing the legitimate user from accessing. Sentence 2: The 18 year-old D. Guzner is a member of the Anonymous group which attacked Scientology website.
